Title: Antibiotics versus topical antiseptics for chronic suppurative otitis media
Abstract: © 2018 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To assess the effectiveness of antibiotics versus antiseptics for people with chronic suppurative otitis media.
